author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
#AdamSavage meets Riley Kolbow (aka @worksbydesign ⁠), the designer and inventor of the transforming chess pieces that went viral! Riley visits the cave to show Adam how his mechanical pawns work and blows our minds with how he engineered, iterated, and manufactured these pieces. 

Subscribe for more videos (and click the bell for notifications):  http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=testedcom
title: #AdamSavage Stunned By These Transforming Chess Pieces!

author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
To break in his new leather punch tool, Adam builds a portable workstation for it out of its metal lever, and puts it immediately to use deconstructing his workbench's worn down leather mat. The markings and manifestation of over five years of workbench builds finds new life in a set of handmade leather keychains that Adam hand makes and assembles!

Thanks to everyone who bought one of these leather tags! Find more of Adam's merch at https://adamsavage.com/

Shot by Adam Savage and edited by Norman Chan
Music by Jinglepunks

Subscribe for more videos (and click the bell for notifications):  http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=testedcom

title: Adam Savage Makes a Leather Punch Tool!
